data.body: For the function $f(x) = \frac{8-x^{3}}{x^{2}-4}$ answer each of the following questions.
data.prompt: (a) Evaluate the function at the following values of  x  compute (accurate to at least 8 decimal places).
data.followUpPrompt: (b) Use the information from (a) to estimate the value of $\lim_{x \to 2} \frac{8-x^{3}}{x^{2}-4} $

data.body: Below is the graph of f(x) . For each of the given points determine the value of  f(a)  and lim x â†’ a f(x). If any of the quantities do not exist clearly explain why.
